hints.label: thm-discrete-lsi-hybrid
hints.title: Discrete-Time LSI
hints.content:
330: :label: thm-discrete-lsi-hybrid
331: 
332: If a Markov operator $\Psi$ satisfies the contraction:
333: 
334: $$
335: D_{\text{KL}}(\Psi \# \mu \| \pi) \leq (1 - \epsilon) D_{\text{KL}}(\mu \| \pi) + C
336: $$
337: 
338: for some $\epsilon > 0$, then $\Psi$ satisfies a discrete-time Log-Sobolev inequality:
339: 
340: $$
341: D_{\text{KL}}(\mu \| \pi) \leq \frac{1}{\epsilon} \text{Ent}_\pi[\mu] + \frac{C}{\epsilon}
342: $$
343: 
344: where $\text{Ent}_\pi[\mu]$ is the relative entropy production.
